website_summaries.verdict: The Sonim XP7 stands up to the elements without sacrificing performance, but you'll need to decide if its durability is worth its premium price.
pros: The Sonim XP7 will take just about anything you can dish out
It has stellar battery life, a versatile display and useful connectivity features for workers who brave the elements
cons: The phone's premium price and bulky chassis will make it a tough sell for those with more modest needs

customer_reviews.title: Battery doesn't last a day, even with min apps
customer_reviews.text: The batt is the down side, was suppose to be one of the longest lasting batteries

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone, hope they build a new version with updated android

customer_reviews.title: I'm not impressed with the xp7and I bought it brand ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not impressed with the xp7and I bought it brand new . the colors and functions of the software are dated .There is a software update I have 5.1 but it's still the same dated graphics. Everything runs choppy on it and I can't seem to go forward on a web page after going back. If u look at the pic there's only a back button
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: well i find it not as good as i thought it was and for the market ...
customer_reviews.text: Hi, well i find it not as good as i thought it was and for the market price at is mach to expansive , first of all at is all based on Google...WhY????..secondly at has only 4 language in it...why???..thirdly the Sonim Phone XP5300 has a better operating system on it then the XP7.....now, i don't no if am going to keep the XP 7... thanks
customer_reviews.author: hj wagener

customer_reviews.title: Tough phone
customer_reviews.text: Excellent mil spec phone. Very loud speaker I can hear phone ring while working on job site with ear plugs in. Very well made phone has been dropped in mud, water and taken many falls onto concrete and still works fine.
customer_reviews.author: TheShadow

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excelent buy. I am truly delighted with this cellular phone. Very rugged and does everything is advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Fabricio V.

customer_reviews.title: Constant water damage!
customer_reviews.text: Sorry, I would have LOVED this phone except it breaks within the year of getting it. I am an outdoors person and enjoy some pretty extreme fun, but this is the second I sonim that I got it still broke! I want a phone that is life proof. I don't care that google maps is slow, the phone is slow, or even scratchy speakers, I want it to work as a phone! Honestly if you get this phone don't expect it to be life proof. (The headphone jack cover will break within the first week)
customer_reviews.author: Buddy White

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The battery life is the best , 2 days with regular use.
customer_reviews.author: DEAN D.

customer_reviews.title: Don't blow your money...
customer_reviews.text: No description of camera (must suck or be low megapixel) very poor/amature spec list. There are much better phones out there for a fraction of the price like the kyrocera "duraforce" and the like. For this price you could get the amazing cat s60 with heat vision (inferred) camera and other amazing features. This phone is a joke for its current price
customer_reviews.author: Brad barnes

customer_reviews.title: Very BAD
customer_reviews.text: purchased based on look,listing stated UNLOCKED, but, was only compatible w/ATT, I at the time had Verizon, I switched provders for this cell, and its the worst, bad reception, call drop, short battery life, works like a decade old cell!!!

product_meta.title: Sonim XP7 XP7700 16GB 4G/LTE Smartphone - (GSM Only, No CDMA) Factory Unlocked - International Version with No Warranty (Yellow on Black)
feature_bullets: For USA Buyers : This Smartphone is not compatible/will not work with any CDMA Networks including : VERIZON, SPRINT, US CELLULAR. Please check with your network provider for 3G or 4G/LTE compatibility check before you purchase.
Corning Gorilla Glass 2 with glove touch, blanview display
Memory : 16GB Internal storage / 1GB RAM / User memory: 12GB
